attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I like trump so much and he is the best president and loves all black and Hispanic people and cares about us And he is friends with Obama🤩 dat why he the best president and he is our skinny king🤪 so I download the app , but then it glitch me out and flash lights so I said a curse word to the app and trump supperoters shoot bullets at my house for disrespecting trump🤬 so I escape out my window and they followed me all the way to Africa!! But the trump supperoeters love Africa so much that they stayed their! Because trump superiors are not racist and they love all Hispanic and black people 😍 NO TRUMP SUPPERTERS ARE RACIST😡 I WILL KICK YOU OUT TRUMP!! UR APP NOT GOOD
attributes.title: Trump superters attacked me🤬

attributes.review: My mother and my father have two VERY different political views. My mom likes trump but my dad likes Hillary. They would have CONSTANT fights about their views. Me personally, I like Hillary better but that isn’t the point of my review. One day, my mother downloaded this app onto her phone. My dad noticed her using it, and they got into the biggest dispute I have ever seen them in. And that is why they got divorced. Me and my brother cannot see each other anymore, because of my parents’ split. I blame Donald J. Trump and this horrible app for causing my family to burn in flames. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP.
attributes.title: Destroyed my Family

attributes.review: I went to open the app and it crashed only a few seconds in. I am disappointed and befuddled as to why my presidents app is this glitchy. I know it is not my phone because as a white woman in america I can afford luxurious things such as the iPhone 11. I would like to speak with the manager of this app because it is completely irresponsible for them to allow this app to become so unusable. This app has made me very upset and as someone as entitled and privileged as I - I SHOULD NOT HAVE TO ENDURE USING SUCH A RIDICULOUS APP! FIX THE GLITCH OR REMOVE THE APP!!!!
attributes.title: Absolutely Horrible!!! Would not recommend🧚‍♀️

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app with my son to support our lovely president because although he’s a child molesting Cheeto, I as a woman knew that I was supposed to support him anyway because he is what made America “Great again”.
I was excited to download. And my son was also interested, so I let him watch me look around the app! All was well, until it downloaded.. immediately, a Cheeto with hair and eyes popped on the screen! Though I was scared, my son was even more sacred. He went into cardiac arrest, fell of the couch, and broke his neck! I immediately called 911, and the treatment is more then you can ever imagine! So, I’m planning to sue the app! I’ll be going to trail this December and once I win, I will use the money to not only pay for my son’s spinal treatment, but the treatment for his PTSD! 

See you in court!

(Edit, I realize that it was irresponsible to let my son watch me download it)
attributes.title: Planning to sue

attributes.review: The year was 2016 and one government idiot was replacing another. I was watching on my tv in my hotel room, the match between the orange and the baby eater and sat in dismay that these two brain dead maggots were elected as the best fit for president. The scene was set like two wrestlers fighting for the belt at the top of the ladder. Except Hillary left early because the extremists on the right took her back stage and beat her with metal chairs. Thus the orange slobbered as he won and everyone screamed in terror. The orange took its final form, flashed his member at the cnn cameraman and was teleported to the White House in a tornado of flames.
attributes.title: A terrible horrifying story

attributes.review: This app is basically the digital version of those sugar free gummy bears. You know the ones Im talking about, right? Well look for yourself, do a search and you too will read the reviews of the devastating effects of sugar free gummy bears on your digestive system. Anyways, I would be weary of this app in a similar way I am weary to wear white pants after indulging in an 8 ounce bag of sugar free gummy bears. First the farts happen, then you know the squish is right around the corner. Hail Satan, Trump is the new Hitler. Black lives matter. Black trans lives matter.
attributes.title: Downloading changes your life (for the worse)

attributes.review: i heard something about a girl named Ped O Philia being used by this guy named Trump and i don’t like the fact that guys still think that they can use women for their bodies. it’s disgusting honestly😌💅🧚🏽✨😝😍🙉🙊🙈🧚🏽✨💫 i also heard that he has 6 kids in his basement and he’s been feeding them pizza for the last 7 years, i mean it doesn’t sound too bad, but their internal organs are probably suffering from all of that cheese😔❤️ i heard that he’s also orange and i don’t think that color suits my style😝😍✨ he supposedly lives in a White House and i find that racist😌💅🧚🏽✨ so again, no❤️
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.review: This is an absolutely terrible app considering we have such a “lovely president” right? I’m applaud at such reviews saying that people are just rating it a bad review because they don’t like their president. Which I think it weird because “I adore our beloved president”. “He’s a good person trying to help America” (help destroy America if anything). Sorry my bad my little 3 year old grabbed my phone those kids right? Anyways such an absolutely terrible app I would not recommend to ANYONE. If you can’t tell already I put quotation marks for a reason.😍💕🌈🌷🧚‍♀️✨
attributes.title: absolutely not✨🧚‍♀️💗

attributes.review:
i thought this app would be good. seeing the ratings i thought it would be a joke because, the president naked it!! why would it be bad?! but when i got on to the app it was so slow. i had to wait 10 MINUTES just to open the app. that’s rediculous! why is it so slow? then i thought it was my internet so i restarted my router but then.. it was even worse!! WHAT?! why is it so slow?! when i got into the app i didn’t know what to do. it was a plain white screen saying wait. that’s stupid. what am i waiting for?!
please update your app.
attributes.title: slow

attributes.review: the reviews when i first got the app were quite strange, but i was determined to find out ways i can keep supporting our president. as soon as i opened the app things started going terribly wrong!! first off my phone completely shut down, then it was freezing and lagging and glitching. after that the app was somewhat working and let me tell you, it was the worst app i have ever used in my WHOLE entire life. It’s no good and completely meaningless. i was truly disappointed and should have have never downloaded this app.
attributes.title: total disaster
